title: Men, this towel hanging secret helps you get a bigger manhood size, stronger erections and last longer in bed
text:
Campus Life Home News Update Men, this towel hanging secret helps you get a bigger manhood size, stronger erections and last longer in bed Men, this towel hanging secret helps you get a bigger manhood size, stronger erections and last longer in bed Posted By: Dave Taidi on: February 28, 2017 Tweet 0 
Today, I want to reveal a simple towel hanging exercise that really helps you add extra inches to your manhood size. 
This technique is among one of the exercises that I found out that actually work when it comes to increasing the penis, others which I discovered in my research are jelquing and stretching . 
For some of you that are just coming across my article, My name is Dave Taidi, and I am a men health specialist and researcher. 
And truth be told, I was once like most Nigerian men that are suffering in shame and silence because of premature ejaculation and small manhood size. 
I almost lost my wonderful fiancee, Elizabeth because I was just a one minute man that release too fast and my dick was also small. 
But my entire life story changed, when I discovered a simple device that helped me enlarged my penis and a herbal supplement that permanently cure my quick ejaculation. 
Let’s move further to the towel hanging secret that helped me increase my penis size gradually, before I discovered the faster and simple handsome up device. 
You can only do this when your penis is partially erect. 
Step 1 – Hang a small towel over your penis. You can use a dry or wet towel depending on the weight your penis can carry. 
Step 2 – Use the erect penis too raise the penis, then lower it, then raise it up again. 
Step 3 – Do this exercise routine 10 – 15 times daily. 
By doing this towel exercise, what you will get in return is you will be… 
1) stretching your penis, that is enlarging the size, and 
2) also strengthening your PC muscle, which helps in controlling your ejaculation. 
That’s it.
